accounts.name: ticket

accounts.name: left_mint
docs: The mint of the event's token left side

accounts.name: left_pool
docs: The token account that contains the left side tokens

accounts.name: signer_left_beneficiary_ata
docs: The signer's associated token account of left mint

accounts.name: right_mint

accounts.name: signer
docs: The transaction's signer

accounts.name: event
docs: The prediction event

accounts.name: left_mint
docs: The mint of the event's token left side

accounts.name: left_pool
docs: The token account that contains the left side tokens

accounts.name: right_mint
docs: The mint of the event's token right side

accounts.name: right_pool
docs: The token account that contains the right side tokens

accounts.name: left_mint
docs: The mint of the event's token left side

accounts.name: right_mint
docs: The mint of the event's token right side

errors.name: NonLeftEvent
errors.msg: This event does not have the left mint and left pool

errors.name: NonRightEvent
errors.msg: This event does not have the right mint and right pool

errors.name: NotFinishedEvent
errors.msg: This event has not finsished yet, the end date is not reached or creator have not finished its

errors.name: NotStartedEvent
errors.msg: This event has not started yet

errors.name: BurningEvent
errors.msg: The event is not allow to claim, the tokens losing side had burned

errors.name: ResultNotSetEvent
errors.msg: The event's result has not set

errors.name: ResultAlreadySetEvent
errors.msg: The event's result has been set

types.name: Master
docs: The master account who authorized person related to the fee system

fields.name: address
docs: The master's wallet pubkey

fields.name: bump
docs: The account's canonical bump

types.name: PredictionEvent
docs: The prediction event account

fields.name: id
docs: The event's unique id that is generated before deploying

fields.name: creator
docs: The event creator's wallet pubkey

fields.name: bump
docs: The account's canonical bump

fields.name: start_date
docs: The event's starting date in seconds timestamp

fields.name: end_date
docs: The event's ending date in seconds timestamp

fields.name: left_pool
docs: The left side vault's amount

fields.name: right_pool
docs: The right side vault's amount

fields.name: left_mint
docs: The left side token mint's pubkey.
If the left side is solana native token instead, it should be None

fields.name: right_mint
docs: The right side token mint's pubkey.
If the right side is solana native token instead, it should be None

fields.name: result
docs: The event's event, it was be set by the creator

fields.name: burning
docs: The optional burning configuration,
If set true the tokens losing side would be burned instead of claiming from the winning side's winners

types.name: Ticket
docs: The ticket account represents the choice of predictors

fields.name: creator
docs: The predictor's wallet pubkey

fields.name: amount
docs: The bet amount for the choice

fields.name: selection
docs: The choice's side
